title: Crab-meat-stuffed Sole
summary: Crab-meat-stuffed Sole might be just the main course you are searching for. This recipe serves 1 and costs $15.92 per serving. One portion of this dish contains around 91g of protein, 24g of fat, and a total of 703 calories. 16 people were glad they tried this recipe. If you have bread crumbs, flat-leaf parsley, garlic clove, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. To use up the lemon zest you could follow this main course with the Orange Marmalade Cookies with Orange Zest Icing as a dessert. It is a good option if you're following a dairy free and pescatarian diet. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 88%. This score is awesome. Similar recipes include Crab-Stuffed Sole, Crab & Shrimp Stuffed Sole, and Tangy Crab-Stuffed Sole.

winePairing.pairingText: Shellfish on the menu? Try pairing with Chardonnay, Muscadet, and Riesling. Buttery chardonnay is great for scallops, shrimp, crab, and lobster, while muscadet is a classic pick for mussels, oysters, and clams. If you've got some spice in your shellfish, a semi-dry riesling can balance out the heat. The Rochioli Estate Chardonnay with a 4.3 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 42 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Rochioli Estate Chardonnay
productMatches.description: This wine is a fine example of the unique characteristics from the Rochioli property and the Russian River Valley. Aromas of ripe apple, tropical fruit, hazelnut and a touch of spice combine with the rich apple flavors and crisp acidity.
